code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{toast}from"react-toastify";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[error,setError]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!email||!password){setError(true);return false;}setError(false);const auth=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("auth"));if(auth.email===email&&auth.password===password){toast.success("logged In Successfully");localStorage.setItem("login","yes");navigate("/");}else{toast.error("Invalid Credentials");console.log("toast.error");}setEmail("");setPassword("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"form-box",autoComplete:"on",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"inputBox",id:"email",type:"text",placeholder:"Enter Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),error&&!email&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"invalid-input",children:"Enter vaild a email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"inputBox",id:"password",type:"password",placeholder:"Enter Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),error&&!password&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"invalid-input",children:"Enter vaild a password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"register-btn",onClick:handleLogin,children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"register-switch",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["don't have account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",children:"Signup here"})," "]})})]})});};export default Login;
